name: Saga of Bupkis - Invasion of the Gribs: Battle for the Void - Super Battle Tactics Elite DX
name_original: Saga of Bupkis - Invasion of the Gribs: Battle for the Void - Super Battle Tactics Elite DX
description:
Saga of Bupkis - Invasion of the Gribs: Battle for the Void - Super Battle Tactics Elite DX is a strategy game developed by WiddleMedia. It came out on 07-10-2019.
Saga of Bupkis - Invasion of the Gribs: Battle for the Void - Super Battle Tactics Elite DX is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
